label: Autorefraction
description: An acquisition device, process or method that measures autorefraction.

label: Audio
description: An acquisition device, process or method that records audio.

label: Hemodynamic Waveform
description: An acquisition device, process or method that records hemodynamic waveforms.

label: Intra-Oral Radiography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs intra-oral radiography.

label: Intravascular Optical Coherence Tomography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs intravascular optical coherence tomography

label: Intravascular Ultrasound
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs intravascular ultrasound.

label: Keratometry
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs keratometry.

label: Key Object Selection
description: A device, process or method that creates Key Object Selection objects.

label: Lensometry
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs lensometry.

label: Laser surface scan
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs laser surface scanning.

label: Mammography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs mammography.

label: Magnetic Resonance
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs magnetic resonance imaging.

label: Nuclear Medicine
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs nuclear medicine imaging.

label: Ophthalmic Axial Measurements
description: An acquisition device, process or method that measures the axial length of the eye.

label: Ophthalmic Photography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs ophthalmic photography.

label: Bone Densitometry (ultrasound)
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs ultrasound bone densitometry.

label: Biomagnetic imaging
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs biomagnetic imaging.

label: Bone Densitometry (X-Ray)
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs bone mineral densitometry by X-Ray, including dual-energy X-Ray absorptiometry (DXA) and morphometric X-Ray absorptiometry (MXA).

label: Optical Coherence Tomography (non-Ophthalmic)
description: An acquisition device, process or method that uses an interferometric, non-invasive optical tomographic technique to image 2D slices and 3D volumes of tissue using visible and near visible frequencies.

label: Ophthalmic Mapping
description: An acquisition device, process or method that measures corneal topography, corneal or retinal thickness, and other similar parameters that are typically displayed as maps.

label: Ophthalmic Tomography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs tomography of the eye that is based on light and optical principles. Tomography based on other principles, such as ultrasound, is excluded.

label: Ophthalmic Visual Field
description: An acquisition device, process or method that measures visual fields and perform visual perimetry.

label: Optical Surface Scan
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs optical surface scanning.

label: Positron emission tomography (PET)
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs positron emission tomography (PET).

label: Panoramic X-Ray
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs panoramic X-Rays.

label: Registration
description: An image processing device, process or method that creates Registration objects.

label: Radio Fluoroscopy
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs radiofluoroscopy.

label: Radiographic imaging (conventional film/screen)
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs radiographic imaging (conventional film/screen).

label: Radiotherapy Dose
description: A device, process or method that records radiotherapy dose.

label: Radiotherapy Image
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs radiotherapy imaging; includes portal imaging.

label: Radiotherapy Plan
description: A device, process or method that produces radiotherapy plans.

label: RT Treatment Record
description: A device, process or method that records radiotherapy treatment records.

label: Radiotherapy Structure Set
description: A device, process or method that produces Radiotherapy Structure Sets.

label: SEG Segmentation
description: An image processing device, process or method that performs segmentation.

label: Slide Microscopy
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs slide microscopy.

label: Stereometric Relationship
description: A device, process or method that records relationships between stereometric image pairs.

label: SR Document
description: A device, process or method that creates Structured Report documents.

label: Subjective Refraction
description: An acquisition device, process or method that records subjective refraction.

label: Thermography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs thermography.

label: Ultrasound
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs ultrasound.

label: Visual Acuity
description: An acquisition device, process or method that measures visual acuity.

label: X-Ray Angiography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs X-Ray angiography.

label: External-camera Photography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs photography with an external camera.

label: Computed Radiography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs computed radiography.

label: Computed Tomography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs computed tomography.

label: Diaphanography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs diaphanography.

label: Digital Radiography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs digital radiography.

label: Electrocardiography
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs electrocardiography.

label: Cardiac Electrophysiology
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs cardiac electrophysiology.

label: Endoscopy
description: An acquisition device, process or method that records images during endoscopy.

label: General Microscopy
description: An acquisition device, process or method that performs general microscopy.

label: Hard Copy
description: A device, process or method that creates images to be printed as hard copy.
